node.title: Up to 100 'likely' killed in Kentucky as tornadoes wreak havoc in US
node.alt: Andy Beshear speaking from behind a podium.
node.description: Up to 100 people are likely to have been killed in a devastating series of tornadoes that ripped through Kentucky and several other US states, Kentucky Governor Andy Beshear says.
node.content:
["Up to 100 people are likely\u00a0to have been killed in a devastating series of tornadoes that ripped through Kentucky and several other US\u00a0states late Friday and early Saturday, Kentucky Governor Andy Beshear said.", "He told local TV station WLKY that a state of emergency had been declared and that he believed the number of dead would be at least 50.", "\"We believe the death toll from this event will exceed 50 Kentuckians, probably end up closer to 70 to 100 lost lives,\" he said.", "\"This is likely to be the most severe tornado outbreak in our state's history.\"", "Mr Beshear said the tornado had caused damage across\u00a0over a dozen counties in the state, leaving more than 56,000\u00a0people without power.\u00a0", "The hardest-hit area appeared\u00a0to be the city of Mayfield in Grave county,\u00a0where a roof collapse at a candle factory caused \"mass casualties\".", "About 110 people were inside the\u00a0candle factory in the area when the tornado ripped through, the New York Times reported.", "\"We believe we'll lose at least dozens of those individuals,\" Mr Beshear was quoted as saying by the Times.", "In Tennessee, the severe weather killed at least three people, authorities said, while at least one person was killed and five were injured when a tornado shredded the roof of a nursing home in Monette in northern Arkansas.", "Craighead County Judge Marvin Day told The Associated Press that a tornado struck the Monette Manor nursing home at about 8:15pm\u00a0local time, trapping 20 people inside as the building collapsed around them.", "Within two hours, the building had been cleared and everyone initially believed to have been inside had been accounted for, Mr Day said.", "", "
Photo appearing to show the Monette Manor nursing home. Twitter/@brianemfinger(Twitter/@brianemfinger)
", "In Illinois, authorities said people were trapped after a roof partially collapsed at an Amazon\u00a0warehouse near St\u00a0Louis late on Friday after tornadoes and strong storms blew through the area.", "\u201cThe safety and well-being of our employees and partners is our top priority right now,\" Amazon spokesperson Richard Rocha said in a written statement.", "\"We\u2019re assessing the situation and will share additional information when it\u2019s available.\u201d", "", "
It is believed people are trapped inside the Amazon warehouse.(AP:\u00a0St. Louis Post-Dispatch/Robert Cohen)
", "The storms caused a CSX company freight train to derail in western Kentucky, although no injuries were reported, the Times said.", "Bill Bunting, operations chief at the Storm Prediction Center, part of the National Weather Service, said at least five states were hit by the tornadoes: Illinois, Kentucky, Tennessee, Missouri, and Arkansas, the Times reported.", "ABC/Reuters"]
